sentences.en: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.cn: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.en: a teaching career
sentences.cn: 教学事业

sentences.en: Chantal was lucky to be able to salvage her career.
sentences.cn: 尚塔尔能保住她的事业算是走了运。

sentences.en: During his career, he wrote more than fifty plays.
sentences.cn: 在他的创作生涯里，他共写了五十多部剧作。

sentences.en: Experience of any career in sales is a big plus.
sentences.cn: 任何销售领域的工作经验都是一大优势。

sentences.en: For Pritchard, reaching an Olympics was the climax of her career.
sentences.cn: 对普里查德来说，参加奥运会是她事业上的巅峰。

sentences.en: He finally admitted that his film career was kaput.
sentences.cn: 他最终承认他的电影生涯走到尽头了。

sentences.en: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.cn: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.en: I had to postpone ideas of a career and stay at home.
sentences.cn: 我不得不暂缓就业打算，呆在家里。

sentences.en: In his long career at BP, Horton turned around two entire divisions.
sentences.cn: 霍顿在英国石油公司漫长的职业生涯中曾经让两个部门整体上起死回生。

sentences.en: Lesley's career in the church is vitally important to her.
sentences.cn: 莱斯莉在教堂的工作经历对她来说至关重要。

sentences.en: My personal life has had to take second place to my career.
sentences.cn: 我的私人生活不得不让位于事业。

sentences.en: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.cn: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

sentences.en: Robb is torn between becoming a doctor and a career in athletics.
sentences.cn: 罗布在做医生还是当运动员之间痛苦抉择，左右为难。

sentences.en: She dusted herself down and left to build her own career.
sentences.cn: 她重振旗鼓去开创自己的事业了。

sentences.en: She received very little career guidance when young.
sentences.cn: 她年轻时没受过什么就业指导。

sentences.en: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
sentences.cn: 卡琳设法达到了其职业的要求。

sentences.en: Take the opportunity to plunge yourself into your career.
sentences.cn: 抓住机会投身到事业中去。

sentences.en: Talent, hard work and sheer tenacity are all crucial to career success.
sentences.cn: 事业要成功，才能、勤奋和顽强的意志都至关重要。

sentences.en: These are kamikaze jobs, the ones almost guaranteed to end your career.
sentences.cn: 这些是极危险的工作，差不多准保能毁了你的事业。

sentences.en: Wood has not had much luck in carving out a career.
sentences.cn: 伍德想干出点名堂来，可是总不能如愿。

phrases.tran_cn: 职业选择；事业选择；选择职业
生涯教育；职业教育；事业教育
生涯规划；职业规划；事业前途策划
职业高原；职业生涯高原

trans.tran_en: Career advice or guidance consists of information about different jobs and help with deciding what kind of job you want to do
a job or profession that you have been trained for, and which you do for a long period of your life
to move forwards quickly without control, making sudden sideways movements
